name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Machine Learning Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, leveraging expertise in **Python** and advanced technologies such as **LLMs** and **Generative AI**. Demonstrated proficiency in application architecture, distributed computing, and building secure, maintainable microservices frameworks. Hands-on experience with **AWS** and **Public Cloud Certification**, focusing on cloud-native applications and deployment strategies. Skilled in **DevOps**, continuous integration with **Jenkins**, and version control using **GIT**, ensuring robust application security and compliance. Excels in agile methodologies such as **Scrum** and **Kanban** to lead efficient teams. Adept in using modern data storage solutions, including columnar and vector databases, to optimize machine learning workflows. Passionate about building technology solutions that drive real-world impact, combining a strong technical foundation with practical experience in MLOps, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
